title: Encountered a bug
body: After champion select and the game has begun the client disappears and the logo of league of legends doesn't appear and I wait a few moments later I can hear the sound of the match but I can't see what's going on.

replies.body: Sounds like the PVPnet client is crashing. If you bring up task manager (ctrl+shift+escape) you can kill the "League of Legends" process which should prompt the base client to pop back up saying the game has crashed. When it does that, it'll come up with a button to relaunch which usually fixes the issue. If you're still having trouble you may need to reinstall or repair install but that'll take a while...
